books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas of the N.Y.P.D. calls on the technological expertise of her husband, Roarke, when three skaters at Wollman Rink are shot by a sniper. By Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: APPRENTICE IN DEATH

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Carl Hiaasen
books.description: The ex-cop Andrew Yancy​ from ​“Bad Monkey” gets involved in a kidnapping gone wrong.
books.name: RAZOR GIRL

books.author: by J. A. Jance
books.description: Joanna Brady, the sheriff of Cochise County, must cope with pregnancy, the recent deaths of her mother and stepfather, an upcoming election — and the mysterious discovery of the bodies of two women at the base of a nearby peak. The 17th novel in a series.
books.name: DOWNFALL

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: A teenage girl heads north on the network that helped slaves escape to freedom, envisioned in this novel as a secret system of actual tracks and tunnels.
books.name: THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: An instructor at the police academy is found murdered, perhaps by one of the cadets favored by Armand Gamache, the retired homicide chief of the Sûreté du Québec.
books.name: A GREAT RECKONING

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A hired killer and a woman he kidnapped join forces to elude the F.B.I. agents and others who are searching for her corrupt brother.
books.name: STING

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Six people cope with a hurricane in New York City.
books.name: RUSHING WATERS

books.author: by  Clare Mackintosh
books.description: A woman moves to the Welsh coast to escape a painful memory.
books.name: I LET YOU GO

books.author: by James Patterson with Max DiLallo
books.description: A mother sets out to avenge the murder of her son.
books.name: 113 MINUTES

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Tense turning points for three couples at a backyard barbecue gone wrong.
books.name: TRULY MADLY GUILTY

books.author: by Jonathan Safran Foer
books.description: Private and public crises converge for four generations of a Jewish family.
books.name: HERE I AM
